DATABASE.SQL_QUERY: Select MESSAGE_TYPE, DELIVERY_STATUS,TWC_MESSAGE from TWC_XML_MESSAGE where PON = ${PON}

Select EVENT, DELIVERY_STATUS, RECEIVED_ESR_ORDER from ESR_ORDER_MESSAGE where ORDERID = ${ORDERID}

Select MESSAGE_TYPE, DELIVERY_STATUS,PROCESS_XML from CUSTOMER_XML_MESSAGE where PON = ${PON}
